hoseok: you’ve never been so compassionate, for a minute then i thought you were...
body:
yoongi: we’ve had some good times you and me.

hoseok: you’ve never been so compassionate, for a minute then i thought you were going to propose ahah.

yoongi: *putting away the ring* well - that would be stupid - ahah.

hoseok: *putting away his ring aswell* - ahah.

blog.name: ao3feednamjin
blog.title: *winkwonk*
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: Plant me, let me grow
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2wZHJcJ

by xenn

“

Amaryllis is a flower symbolic of splendid beauty. It is also used to indicate worth beyond beauty.

Namjoon always loved nature.

”

(Alternatively)
Namjoon has a flower shop and problems, Jin doesn’t even have a flower shop…

admin hh and admin s☀️

summary: Hi there, loveliness! How have you been? I hope you’re happy and healthy :) Can I have a written ship with BTS, please?  I'm an...
body:
Hi there, loveliness! How have you been? I hope you’re happy and healthy :) Can I have a written ship with BTS, please? I’m an ENFJ, scorpio, 5'7", have a long black hair, dark eyes, fair skin, oval face and chubby cheeks. I’m the eldest of 4, making me reliable and a good leader. Very caring, supportive (#1 fan🤣), affectionate, kind, strong both physically and mentally. Really nice a friendly to everyone and polite around adults. I get competitive and fearless sometimes. I’m a good listener so as a good adviser. I work hard, play hard! I do things fast, walk fast, work fast, speak fast but I always think through it before act. When I work with others, I’m the idea gatherer. If there’s a problem, they tend to let me deal with it. I’m pretty agreeable and good with comforting. My way is to encouraging people, not to use harsh words or yell. I love sharing my love with my family & people I care. I just love, enjoy doing thoughtful things for others and always wish them well. I like to take things slow when it comes to love. If I date someone, ‘like’ is not enough. I must feel that I gonna love him so much in the future. Then, I’ll date him. Because if I’m someone’s girlfriend, I want to be it forever. If I love, they will have all of me and my support. I’ll fill what they lack and I’ll cut down what that’s too much. I’m good with children, they make me super happy! 😍 I really enjoy being around them. My friends say I’m persuasive, understanding, altruistic, funny, very friendly and very warm. I adore animals, children & LOVE cuddling, skinship, coffee and books. In my spare time, I dance and work-out, as well as reading, watching movie (horror movies are my fav) and cooking. I enjoy amusement park & adventurous things. I really like stars gazing and going for a walk at night. Listening to music is things. I love the sound of piano the most. I hate heat & worst with directions. I’m always there for my sibling. Smile’s always on my face & I hope everyone can smile, too. I like someone who is firm both with his actions and his words. The one who keeps his promise and doesn’t lie brcause I’d trust him and only him whole heartly. I’m not good with change. So, it’s ok if he’s not the strongest but can give me a sense of steadiness and security. It’d be great if he’s family-oriented and loves his family. If I love someone, I love his family too. Thank you so much for your kindness!! please take your time with my ship if you’re too busy, I understand!🌹 Hwaiting ♥ I hope you have a lovely day filled with smiles, a lot of love and support.~❤️❤️❤️

Hiiii

I ship you with J Hope💜💜💜

Ugh i hate to do this but if you wanted a scenario you should have told me the genre. Its written clearly in my rules…

blog.description: ⁽ⁿᵃᵛⁱ⁾ ⁱ ᶜᵃⁿᵗ ˢˡᵉᵉᵖ, ʰᵒᵐᵉˢⁱᶜᵏ ᵇᵃᵇᵉ ⁽ʷᵒʳᵏ⁾

summary:
OTP Drabble Challenge/BTS Drabble Challenge:
7. “Did you hear that?” - “I’m telling you, I’m haunted.” 
You took a deep breath,...
body:
OTP Drabble Challenge/BTS Drabble Challenge:

7. “Did you hear that?” - “I’m telling you, I’m haunted.”

You took a deep breath, taking in the image in front of you, chills already visible on your skin at the atmosphere alone. You looked at the creepy old asylum and looked at your friends with fear. “Uhh whose idea was it again to explore this place?”

“Well, definitely not mine. I don’t want to be haunted by more ghosts, I already have one breathing down my neck each time I open my closet” Jungkook snorted with a laugh.

“Maybe you got possessed, that’s why you act like an abomination” Jimin laughed, Taehyung fist bumping him.

“Guys!” You protested. “Don’t call ghosts abominations when we are about to get inside. It’s rude and they will get mad at us. I want to get out of here alive” You said as you made your first steps inside, all of you holding a flashlight to look around.

“And I want to get laid after this, so we’re on the same page” Jungkook wiggled his eyebrows at you.

You rolled your eyes at him and hit his arm before continuing your exploration. The whole asylum had a creepy aura written all over it. Blood scattered around, old rooms and cells from patients. You and your friends always took on these adventures, but never a freaking haunted asylum in the middle of the night. It had bad idea written all over it. Yet you still agreed.

You decided to take a break when you reached the old cafeteria, Taehyung finding the courage to sit down on a chair and surprisingly, it didn’t break. “Yo, do you think I’m sitting on a ghost right now?” He asked earning a laugh from Jimin.

“We should talk to them” Jungkook shrugged.

You looked at him, eyes wide. “Are you insane? I think you saw what happened in Hereditary when they tried to contact Charlie!”

“Well, baby this is the real world and not the world of a ghost of a decapitated thirteen-year-old” He teased with a smirk. “Besides, I think Johnny followed us”

“He did what?!” You asked.

“Who the hell is Johnny?” Jimin snorted.

“It’s my closet ghost” Jungkook said. “We’ve become friends. He helps me out with styling. Whenever he doesn’t like an outfit, he makes something fall from its hanger”

“You’re so stupid. You’re not friends with a ghost” You rolled your eyes at him.

“Watch me prove it” He smirked.

“Tell him to break a lamp or something” Taehyung laughed.

“Consider it done. You heard them, Johnny man” Jungkook said, with a smirk of satisfaction. “Shush and just listen”

You shook your head in disbelief and everyone stopped talking, in order for “Johnny” to make an appearance. You tapped your foot on the floor, waiting until you all heard a click and then glass breaking from the distance. Your eyes widened and you jumped, wrapping your arms around Jungkook. “What the heck?” Jimin asked.

“Did you hear that?” You said.

“I’m telling you, I’m haunted!” Jungkook whined.

“Yeah, no sex for you later until you make your buddy leave the closet” You patted his back.

“Oh come on!”

AU: Another fun one yay!

Masterlist

“Consider it done. You heard them, Johnny man” Jungkook said, with a smirk of satisfaction. “Shush and just listen”

You shook your head in disbelief and everyone stopped talking, in order for “Johnny” to make an appearance. You tapped your foot on the floor, waiting until you all heard a click and then glass breaking from the distance. Your eyes widened and you jumped, wrapping your arms around Jungkook. “What the heck?” Jimin asked.

“Did you hear that?” You said.

“I’m telling you, I’m haunted!” Jungkook whined.

“Yeah, no sex for you later until you make your buddy leave the closet” You patted his back.

“Oh come on!”

AU: Another fun one yay!

Masterlist

trail.content_raw:
OTP Drabble Challenge/BTS Drabble Challenge:

7. “Did you hear that?” - “I’m telling you, I’m haunted.”

You took a deep breath, taking in the image in front of you, chills already visible on your skin at the atmosphere alone. You looked at the creepy old asylum and looked at your friends with fear. “Uhh whose idea was it again to explore this place?”

“Well, definitely not mine. I don’t want to be haunted by more ghosts, I already have one breathing down my neck each time I open my closet” Jungkook snorted with a laugh.

“Maybe you got possessed, that’s why you act like an abomination” Jimin laughed, Taehyung fist bumping him.

“Guys!” You protested. “Don’t call ghosts abominations when we are about to get inside. It’s rude and they will get mad at us. I want to get out of here alive” You said as you made your first steps inside, all of you holding a flashlight to look around.

“And I want to get laid after this, so we’re on the same page” Jungkook wiggled his eyebrows at you.

You rolled your eyes at him and hit his arm before continuing your exploration. The whole asylum had a creepy aura written all over it. Blood scattered around, old rooms and cells from patients. You and your friends always took on these adventures, but never a freaking haunted asylum in the middle of the night. It had bad idea written all over it. Yet you still agreed.

You decided to take a break when you reached the old cafeteria, Taehyung finding the courage to sit down on a chair and surprisingly, it didn’t break. “Yo, do you think I’m sitting on a ghost right now?” He asked earning a laugh from Jimin.

“We should talk to them” Jungkook shrugged.

You looked at him, eyes wide. “Are you insane? I think you saw what happened in Hereditary when they tried to contact Charlie!”

“Well, baby this is the real world and not the world of a ghost of a decapitated thirteen-year-old” He teased with a smirk. “Besides, I think Johnny followed us”

“He did what?!” You asked.

“Who the hell is Johnny?” Jimin snorted.

“It’s my closet ghost” Jungkook said. “We’ve become friends. He helps me out with styling. Whenever he doesn’t like an outfit, he makes something fall from its hanger”

“You’re so stupid. You’re not friends with a ghost” You rolled your eyes at him.

“Watch me prove it” He smirked.

“Tell him to break a lamp or something” Taehyung laughed.

“Consider it done. You heard them, Johnny man” Jungkook said, with a smirk of satisfaction. “Shush and just listen”

You shook your head in disbelief and everyone stopped talking, in order for “Johnny” to make an appearance. You tapped your foot on the floor, waiting until you all heard a click and then glass breaking from the distance. Your eyes widened and you jumped, wrapping your arms around Jungkook. “What the heck?” Jimin asked.

“Did you hear that?” You said.

“I’m telling you, I’m haunted!” Jungkook whined.

“Yeah, no sex for you later until you make your buddy leave the closet” You patted his back.

“Oh come on!”

AU: Another fun one yay!

summary: OTP Drabble Challenge/BTS Drabble Scenario: 5. “Don’t yell at me like I’m a child!!” - “DON’T THROW SCISSORS!”  You put your...
body:
OTP Drabble Challenge/BTS Drabble Scenario:

5. “Don’t yell at me like I’m a child!!” - “DON’T THROW SCISSORS!”

You put your gear on and as soon as everyone was ready and dressed, you walked out on the field, your adrenaline already pumping up from excitement as you waited for your paintball instructor to come to tell you what you should do first. “Okay, the instructor said we need to assign our team leaders and members of each team” Namjoon spoke up, clapping his hands together to get everyone’s attention.

“I want to be a leader. I’m the most handsome, so I automatically win” Jin said with a smile of pride as everyone laughed.

“We should do rock, paper scissors. It’s more fair for everyone” You suggested.

“The instructor said we have two teams and since there are so many of us, we get a leader and a sub-leader. So whoever gets picked to be the leader, get to pick a companion” Namjoon explained.

“You better pick me if I don’t win,” You told Taehyung with a smirk. “I don’t want to be the leader, so I’m out”

“Okay, everyone else in?” Namjoon asked, getting nods.

All of the boys, including the other two girls, Hoseok’s sister, and Jimin’s girlfriend played rock, paper, scissors, and Taehyung went ahead of everyone, winning almost every time until it was only him, Yoongi and Hoseok’s sister left. “As much as I want to support my girl, you need to win this,” You told Taehyung.

“Wow, no pressure at all there” Taehyung rolled his eyes at you as you rubbed his shoulders as if this was a life or death situation.

You saw them all play and as soon as Taehyung threw scissors, he lost, earning a disapproving remark from Namjoon who was rooting for him. “Tae! You shouldn’t have done that, that was uncalled for! You knew Yoongi would throw rock again, he always does!”

“Hey!” Yoongi protested.

“Don’t yell at me like I’m a child!” He whined.

“Don’t throw scissors!” You protested.

“I’m taking y/n on my team, lover boy. It really was a loss, she’s good” Yoongi shrugged, teasing Taehyung.

“And I’m taking Tae” Hoseok’s sister said, Taehyung walking over to her side.

You squinted your eyes, shooting Taehyung with a death stare. “You’re going down”

“Bring it on, kitten. As if you could hurt me with those little claws” He teased you and you stuck your tongue out to him.

“Okay, everyone!” The instructor began. “Let’s begin!”

AU: I wanted to give this a fun twist and I hope it was okay!

Masterlist
